p: In addition to the SIRS model, we consider three alternate model structures: Susceptible-Infectious-Recovered (SIR); Susceptible-Exposed-Infectious-Recovered (SEIR); and Susceptible-Exposed-Infectious-Recovered-Susceptible (SEIRS). The Exposed compartment in the SEIR and SEIRS models represent a latent period of infection. The equations describing these additional model structures are provided in S1 Appendix.
